source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive, ominous storm system moving over a rural landscape. The dark, turbulent clouds of what appears to be a supercell thunderstorm are seen progressing across the fields. The dramatic scene is illuminated by a sliver of light on the horizon beneath the dark storm front.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive, ominous storm system moving over a rural landscape. The dark, turbulent clouds of what appears to be a supercell thunderstorm are seen progressing across the fields. The dramatic scene is illuminated by a sliver of light on the horizon beneath the dark storm front.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several birds can be seen flying rapidly across the sky in front of the storm clouds, which is not accurate for this video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video captures a massive, ominous storm system moving over a rural landscape. The dark, turbulent clouds of what appears to be a supercell thunderstorm progress across the fields, while several birds can be seen flying rapidly across the sky in front of the storm clouds. The dramatic scene is illuminated by a sliver of light on the horizon beneath the dark storm front.
